clinical_study.brief_title: Phase IIa Study of the Product QGC001 Compared With Placebo in Patients With Essential Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Two-period, Placebo Controlled, Forced-titration Proof of Concept Crossover Study to Compare QGC001 With Placebo in Patients With Grade I or II Essential Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: 2QG1 is a Phase IIa study aiming to assess the blood pressure lowering effect of 4-week administration of QGC001 oral doses in patients with grade I or II essential hypertension compared to placebo, to assess the safety and tolerability, to obtain preliminary PK information for QGC001 given as multiple oral doses and to determine preliminary PD profile of QGC001 multiple oral doses on plasma and urine hormones, which will be compared to that of placebo.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Period 1 to Period 2 up to 16 weeks (end-of-study visit).
primary_outcome.description: Measurements will include mean 24h systolic and diastolic pressures, and daytime values (measured every 15 min from 07:00 am to 10:00 pm) and night-time values (measured every 20 min from 10:00 pm to 07:00 am). Only ambulatory BP recordings with a minimum of 24 measurements will be considered as successful.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy - Self BP measurements at home
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Period 1 to Period 2 up to 16 weeks.
secondary_outcome.description: Additional information will be obtained from self-measurement of BP at home (HBP) with an automatic validated device. To be performed for 7 consecutive days just before the planned visit.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Period 1 to Period 2 up to 16 weeks.
secondary_outcome.description: Office SBP, DBP and HR measured after resting in the semi-recumbent position for at least 5 min. Office SBP, DBP and HR measured after 1 min in a standing position will be recorded at each visit, immediately before the administration of the study drug.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Period 1 to Period 2 up to 16 weeks.
secondary_outcome.description: The pharmacodynamic neurohormonal effects of QGC001 will be assessed by measurements of plasma active renin, aldosterone, cortisol, adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH), apelin and copeptin as well as urine aldosterone, cortisol, creatinine, sodium and potassium using commercially available validated assays.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Period 1 to Period 2 up to 16 weeks.
secondary_outcome.description: Four (4) PK blood samples will be taken. Plasma levels of QGC001 and its metabolite EC33 will be measured using validated LC/MS/MS methods.
